content.p: If you're looking for a British style degree and the opportunity to study in Asia, consider a course at one of our international campuses in China and Malaysia. All teaching at our international campuses takes place in English, to the same high academic standards as our UK campus degrees, and you will graduate with a University of Nottingham degree. You can also enjoy a very affordable cost of living and all the advantages of living in China and Malaysia – whether you're a student from nearby wanting to study close to home or a student from elsewhere looking for a unique international study experience. As well as full degree programmes in the UK, China and Malaysia, we run an inter-campus exchange programme so you spend a semester or a year at one of these locations during a University of Nottingham degree course. Discover our world at our Ningbo Campus Discover our world at University of Nottingham, Malaysia Campus. External view of the Administration building, Malaysia Campus Copyright - University of Nottingham Campus and facilities Welcome to the University of Nottingham. Each of our UK campuses has a unique character and provides access to world-leading facilities. The University of Nottingham, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Jubilee campus The University of Nottingham, Wollaton Rd, Lenton, Nottingham NG8 1BB Sutton Bonington campus The University of Nottingham, Sutton Bonington, Leicestershire, LE12 5RD, UK If you’re looking for more information, please head to our help and support hub, where you can find frequently asked questions or details of how to make an enquiry.
